PERSONA:
john is a 68-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the east south central region of the south. he holds a postgraduate degree and is part of the upper-income bracket, earning over $100,000 annually. 

john was born and raised in the united states and is a citizen. despite his affluent background, he identifies as a protestant but does not attend religious services. politically, john considers himself an independent voter who leans towards the democratic party and holds moderate to conservative views.

john is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day. however, he does not engage in voluntary work or community service activities. he is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously.

overall, john leads a comfortable life in a metropolitan area, enjoying the benefits of his education and financial stability. while not overtly religious or politically active, he keeps himself informed and participates in the democratic process.
